items.title: New Neighbors Revitalize Battery Park City
items.abstract: A wave of food halls and boutiques is transforming this quiet Manhattan neighborhood along the Hudson River.

items.title: Saving Scraps From the Past Amid New Haven’s Revitalization
items.abstract: An amateur historian springs into action when crews are ready to dig in a spot that might contain traces of the Connecticut city’s past, pleading for a chance to retrieve objects.

items.title: Will Amazon Ruin or Revitalize New York City?
items.abstract: New York’s not ready for Amazon’s HQ2, but here’s how the city can get there.

items.title: House Hunting in … Colombia
items.abstract: In Cartagena, the market has been strong for the last 20 years, since the city’s centuries-old houses began to be restored as luxury properties.

items.title: East Providence Works to Develop Its Waterfront
items.abstract: With the help of tax increment financing, the Rhode Island city and developers are turning the once-blighted area into residential and public spaces.
